title: WFO Policy
content: Employees must attend at least 12 working days per month in the office, with a minimum of 7 hours on-site for each counted day. Attendance is captured via RFID swipes.

title: Lost Laptop Procedure
content: Report immediately to IT/SecOps and your manager. If the device is enrolled in Intune/MDM, request remote lock/wipe. Change your M365 password and sign out of all sessions.

title: VPN - Common Errors
content: Verify internet connectivity first. Confirm the correct portal URL. Approve MFA prompts. Update the VPN client to the approved version. Flush DNS if name resolution fails.
